page.title: 04Housing
page.content: Housing in this area is mainly{ {detached houses}and{cottages,}all of these have good sized gardens.{ { The Manor House}in{Costock}is the biggest house in the area,it was built in Tudor times.It has a very big garden,swimming pool and tennis courts. The houses on{Manor Close,Costock} were built around 16 years ago on the site of the old village cricket green. The{old school}in{Rempstone}has been converted into a house. Housing in Rempstone is mainly modern,but there are old thatched cottages with lots of character.
